00026 #ifndef response_h
00027 #define response_h
00028 
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 
00031 #ifndef _debug_h
00032 #include "debug.h"
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00044 class Response {
00045 private:
00047     FILE *d_stream;
00048 
00049     ObjectType d_type;
00050     string d_version;
00051 
00052 protected:
00055     Response() {}
00056     Response(const Response &rs) {}
00057     Response &operator=(const Response &rhs) {
00058     throw InternalErr(__FILE__, __LINE__, "Unimplemented assignment");
00059     }
00061 
00062 public:
00068     Response(FILE *s) 
00069     : d_stream(s), d_type(unknown_type), d_version("dods/0.0") { }
00070 
00072     virtual ~Response() { 
00073     DBG(cerr << "Closing stream... ");
00074     fclose(d_stream); 
00075     DBGN(cerr << endl);
00076     }
00077 
00080     virtual FILE *get_stream() const { return d_stream; }
00081     virtual ObjectType get_type() const { return d_type; }
00082     virtual string get_version() const { return d_version; }
00084 
00087     virtual void set_type(ObjectType o) { d_type = o; }
00088     virtual void set_version(const string &v) { d_version = v; }
00090 };
